1.12.2.1.1.0:
Tweaked the layout of the book.
Added Statistics section to the book.
Added mouse scroll page turning to the book.
Fixed resident Blessed levels.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Can now open the book by right-clicking a Bed or Item Frame.
Underlined the Resident or Structure name that was right-clicked on.
Added Current Position and Structure to Resident pages.
Added floor tile count to Structure Types and Homes.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
New villager images, include female Cleric and Teacher.
Fixed the level display of Captains when blessed.
Fixed duplicate villager entries after converting the villager.
1.12.2.1.3.1: Fixed the crash opening the book, when running on dedicated server.
1.12.2.1.4.0: Added Total Armor Value, Armor Items and Equipment Items to resident pages.
1.12.2.1.5.0: Cleaned up the book's display. Added new maps at the end of the book. Added more information into the book.
1.12.2.1.6.0:
Added AI Filter page to Resident pages. Replaced Sleeping line with Task, so you can now see what the villager is currently doing.
Added Overcrowding to Structures and Statistics pages.
Added mouse click links to most page types to navigate around and a back button.
Fixed the Resident Count on specific pages.
1.12.2.1.7.0:
Added coordinate links to open the map.
Added additional options to the map.
Fixed Visitor link on Structure detail page.
Added current structure to Visitor page.
Added tile information to Home detail page.
Changed tooltip text when link is for the Home page, not a Structure page.
More clean-up of the books pages.
1.12.2.1.8.0:
Added work and sleep times to the resident and visitor details page.
Added task name to the Enemy list.
Added config option to prevent enemies showing in the book.
Added days and time to book village summary.
Added config option to pause game when open in singleplayer.
1.12.2.1.9.0:
Added new AI Filters section.
Added inventory button to resident page, to display the resident's inventory.
Added keyboard navigation to the book.
